DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of different dry needling dosages in the treatment of myofascial trigger points in the upper trapezius muscle in patients with myofascial neck pain.
DOC.brief_title: Dry Needling Dosage in the Treatment of Myofascial Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of an active myofascial trigger point. Neck pain: Up to 3 cm in EVA Neck area: Fracture, radiculopathy, previous surgery, previous needling treatment in the last 6 months, previous analgesic medication (24 hours), psychiatric disease
